page.title: 20HOUSING, LINCOLN.
page.content: Much of the housing in our area dates from the {Victorian }and {Edwardian {era.}The {slum terraces }were knocked down in the {50's and 60's} and the majority have been modernised. The larger and often older houses tend to be in uphill Lincoln.The{new estates are on the fringes of our area.There has been a fair amount of{conversion of old houses into{flats. Thanks are due to; {Mark Richards, Val Stewart} and Form IIS from South Park High School. {Audrey Stanley, Christine Budge}and forms 10S and 11B from Monks Abbey County Primary School. {Lilian Ellmore, Janna Frost, Sheila {Turner} and class 4 from St. Peter at Gowts Church of England Primary School {Sheila Isherwood, Robert Markham}and class J2 from St. Hugh's Roman Catholic Primary School.
